title: JARDIN DE LUXEMBOURG 6th, Charming 3 Pièces
body:
QR Code Link to This Post


Lovely furnished 3 pièces, within a stone's throw of the west entrance to the Jardin de Luxembourg, on Rue de Fleurus, 6th arrondissement.
On second floor of a historic building, with elevator, furnished. Amazing Location.

Close to the cafés, shops and vibrant streets /rue Vavin / St Sulpice Square/ Montparnasse and St Germain des Prés.
Metro: St. Placide line 4 or Notre­ Dame ­des ­Champs line 12
55 sq metres, 2nd floor with elevator, quiet.
Bedroom, study, living room with open kitchen (fully equipped with dishwasher, cooktop, oven, microwave, large refrigerator/freezer)

Fully fitted bathroom including bathtub, bidet, washing machine.
Lots of storage in apartment.
Elevator, digital lock for communal entrance to building, security door to apartment, central heating.

References required.
1890€ per month, includes cold water, hot water, central heating.
Electricity, telephone, television subscription and internet not included.

Available 31 December. Rental period: minimum 1 month, maximum 8 months.
